characters.name: Suzy
characters.description: Sent to fetch bacon for dinner by her mother.

items.name: Pigs
items.description: Can be raised, and will provide bacon.

locations.name: Home
locations.description: Starting point, and we'll return here at the end.

locations.name: Sketchy-Path Forest
locations.description: Easy to get lost in here.

locations.name: Uncle's Pig Farm
locations.description: Suzy's uncle is okay with her butchering pigs from time to time.

overall.title: Grab the Bacon
overall.description: A character starts in location 1, must go to location 3, get an item there, then return to location 1. To go to a destination, a character must be in one of the allowable source locations. On item screen, specify max number of items gainable, for example, 1.
